name: Town Of Nothing
description:
Attention! Your mission is to kill everything that moves on level and then beat the Boss. If i would describe this game, i’d say “Dark Souls, but with guns and a lot of fun”.

Main controlls:

  • WASD - Move.
  • Shift - Run.
  • Space - Jump.
  • If you see Green Chest - hit it with Left Mouse Button.
  • If you see Red Chest - hit it with Right Mouse Button.
  • Yellow Guys can be destroyed by Left Mouse Button.
  • Trolls can be destroyed with Right Mouse Button and damaged with Left Mouse Button.
  • Red Guys can be destroyed ONLY with Right Mouse Button (3 shots).
  • Boss can be destroyed ONLY from the back and ONLY with Right Mouse Button.
  • P - for RESTART
